content.rendered:
Our Partners

Want to team up?

No one succeeds alone and Jorbanis no exception to that rule. Want to accomplish more together?

Become A Partner

BFFS

Are you tired of turning away work and unreliable partners?

We were. That’s why we started to build strategic partnerships with agencies that complement our skills and align with what we value.

 

If you’re looking for a design and development partner dedicated to delivering memorable websites, look no further.

 

 

Trusted By

Here To Help

How we help agencies like yours succeed

We’re Proven

We’ve been delivering highly recognized work for over 10 years. If you need it done right the first time, we’re the team to make it happen.

No Egos

We’re here to be a team player and help your clients however we can. We’re open to both referral agreements or white label services.

We’re Responsive

We limit the number of clients we take on each year to ensure each one has an outstanding customer experience. Expect responses in hours.

Co-Marketing

Our marketing department is always looking for great opportunities to build awareness for our partners.

Expert Advice

Each one of our partners has direct access to our owners. Whether you need advice on how to scope a project, or just want to talk shop, they’re available.

Rev share

If our partners refer work to us we cut them a commission check. Who doesn’t love passive income?

Get In Touch

Become a Partner

Limited availability

We only partner with a few select companies at a time in order to allow ourselves to build meaningful relationships and maximize the partnership. After receiving your application if we feel it’s a fit someone from Jorbanwill reach out to you directly.

FAQS

Let’s get into the details

Who do you partner with?

 

Typically, the best candidates for a partnership are:

  • Technology Companies
  • Smaller Agencies (<15)
  • Larger Agencies (>100)

What services do you offer?

 

A full list of our service offerings can be found here.

 

In summary, our agency is focused on:

  • Digital Strategy
  • Site Architecture
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-stack Development
  • Custom Theme Development
  • On-site/Technical SEO
  • Content Creation (Writing, Illustrations, Icons etc.)

What platforms do you work with?

 

We specialize in building digital experiences on WordPress and Shopify.

What does your team configuration look like?

 

We have two unique lines of business that are structured slightly differently with multiple teams. In general, they typically look like this:

 

Build

  • 1 Project Manager
  • 1 Creative Director
  • 1 UI/UX Designer
  • 1 Front-end Developer
  • 1 Full-stack Developer
  • 1 QA
  • 1 Copywriter

Support

  • 1 Project Manager
  • 1 Digital Strategist
  • 1 Full-stack Developer
  • 1 UI/UX Designer
  • 1 QA

How would a white-label agreement work?

 

When agencies choose to white-label us, the biggest hurdle to overcome is communication.

 

What we suggest is creating an alternate e-mail for the project manager assigned to your account so they can maintain seamless communication with your client.

 

Project deliverables and organization would be maintained using our preferred PM set-up (ClickUp) and a group Slack channel would be formed to handle smaller collaboration between our teams.

What do you charge?

 

Our typical build project is $75,000-$150,000.

Our typical support agreement starts at $3,000/month.

How much commission can I receive?

 

Commissions are only distributed for referral work. If you choose to white-label our agency, you won’t be entitled to a commission.

Commissions are also only awarded if we win the business referred to us.

 

Exact commissions are negotiated on a per-partnership basis, after that point, the commissions are locked in for the lifetime of the partnership.

 

Commissions typically vary from 5-15%.
